casebody.data:
GAETANO MARINO v. EDWARD J. PETERS ET AL. (13957)

Landau, Schaller and Hennessy, Js.

Argued September 20 decision released October 17, 1995 Norman A. Pattis, with whom, on the brief, was John R. Williams, for the appellant (plaintiff). Michael P. Del Sole, for the appellee (named defendant). Christopher L. Brigham, with whom, on the brief, was Katherine C. Callahan, for the appellee (defendant Anthony Polvino). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
